segments.text: The sheer number of hazards in this kitchen is truly alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: First, there's the overflowing sink, gushing water onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That floor is becoming slick, and someone is bound to slip on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman has her foot right in the puddle, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy on that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance looks so precarious; a fall from that height could be very serious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the adult is so utterly engrossed in drying dishes that she's blind to all this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's irresponsible, frankly, for such dangers to be ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Broken dishes, a head injury, significant water damage â€“ all seem imminent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are just trying to get cookies, but they're in a dangerous situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to intervene here before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
